tool_purpose: Calculates the concrete volume required for a continuous rectangular footing.

inputs.label: Footing Length
inputs.explanation: The total length of the footing trench.

inputs.label: Footing Width
inputs.explanation: The width of the footing trench.

inputs.label: Footing Depth
inputs.explanation: The depth (thickness) of the concrete footing.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Total volume of concrete required for the footing in cubic feet.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Total volume of concrete required for the footing in cubic yards.

assumptions: The footing is continuous and rectangular.
No waste or overage is included.

seo.meta_description: Calculate the concrete volume needed for continuous footings based on length, width, and depth.

tool_notes.title: How this calculator works
tool_notes.text: This calculator calculates concrete volume by multiplying footing length, width, and depth.

tool_notes.title: When to use this calculator
tool_notes.text: Use this calculator for continuous concrete footings under walls, foundations, or structural supports.
